name: Ranger in Spider's den
summary:
Ranger in Spider's den - This is a dynamic shooter with a view from above, in which you have to destroy evil creatures. You are opposed by a swarm that will do everything to destroy you! 
In the arena, you have to destroy first the crowds of monsters, before the queen appears, who will try to deal with you! 
You are an elite soldier, on whose shoulders is entrusted a role, to save the whole planet from destruction! 
In the fight, you will be helped by advanced weapons, which are easily dealt with monsters.
